Metrics and Evaluation Papers

Process Discovery and Validation papers:

"Automating Process Discovery through Event-Data Analysis", by Jonathan E. Cook and Alexander L. Wolf in Proceedings of the 17th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE17), pages 73-82, Seattle, WA, April 1995. Abstract
(cross reference Process)

"Toward Metrics for Process Validation", by Jonathan E. Cook and Alexander L. Wolf in Proceedings of the Third International Conference on the Software Process (ICSP3), pages 33-44, Reston, VA, October 1994. Abstract
(cross reference Process)

"A Study in Software Process Capture and Analysis", by Alexander L. Wolf and David S. Rosenblum in Proceedings of the Second International Conference on the Software Process (ICSP2), pages 115-124, Berlin, Germany, February 1993. Abstract
(cross reference Process)
